import React from "react"; import { Button, Card, CardBody, CardHeader, Form, FormGroup, } from "reactstrap"; import { useQuery } from "@apollo/client"; import { DIRECTOR_LIST } from "../queries/query"; const SideNav = () => { const { data } = useQuery(DIRECTOR_LIST); return (
映画監督
映画作品
); }; export default SideNav;
